card.name: Pulse of the Hollowood
card.text: Whenever one or more cards are put into an opponent's graveyard for the first time each turn, exile them. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Pulse of the Hollowood: Draw a card.

card.name: Snezvalir Songshaper
card.text: Whenever Snezvalir Songshaper becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless that opponent puts two stun counters on a creature they control. At the beginning of combat on your turn, untap up to two target nonland permanents.

card.name: Call of the Hanging Bough
card.text: Whenever you put one or more counters on a permanent you don't control, create a 2/1 white Spirit creature token.

card.name: Wax and Woe
card.text: You may sacrifice an artifact or creature. If you do, create two tokens that are copies of that permanent, except they have haste. At the beginning of your next end step, sacrifice one of them. Exile Wax and Woe.

card.name: Pale Visage
card.text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Pale Visage gets +1/+1 and gains trample and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Boon of Feathers and Fate
card.text: Create three Weapon tokens. For each token created this way, you may attach it to a creature you control. (A Weapon is an Equipment artifact with equip {2} and "Equipped creature gets +1/+1.")

card.name: Weeping Cikavac
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each 1 life you gained this turn. Flying When Weeping Cikavac enters, destroy up to one target nonland permanent.

card.name: Rekindling Affection
card.text: Draw three cards, then discard a card. Create a Treasure token.

card.name: Slabtooth Ambusher
card.text: Whenever a creature you control with power 4 or greater attacks, it gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Unintended Transit
card.text: Exile up to one target artifact card from your graveyard and the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

card.name: Errant Krivolak
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player or noncreature permanent, you may have one of those creatures become a copy of another target creature you control. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Rend to Nothing
card.text: Choose one — • Put two -1/-1 counters on target creature. • Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {3}.

card.name: Winter's Rebuke
card.text: Presence 2 (As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap two untapped lands, artifacts, and/or creatures you control.) Tap all creatures your opponents control, then put a stun counter on each of those creatures.

card.name: Wayward Elder
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, Wayward Elder deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Prudent Grovewarden
card.text: When Prudent Grovewarden enters, create a Hunt battle token an opponent protects with 2 defense and "When this battle is defeated, draw a card." Whenever you defeat a battle, create a 1/1 green Human creature token.

card.name: Pledge of Blooms
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, exile the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of creatures that died under your control this turn. You may play those cards until your next end step.

card.name: Gracesower Satyr
card.text: Lifelink At the beginning of your end step, you may put a refine counter on target Equipment. For as long as it has a refine counter on it, it has "Equip abilities of this Equipment cost {1} less to activate for each refine counter on it."

card.name: Hollow Revelry
card.text: Whenever you gain life, choose a kind of counter at random that Hollow Revelry doesn't have on it from among flying, first strike, deathtouch, menace, trample, vigilance, or wither and put a counter of that kind on Hollow Revelry. {WB}: Until end of turn, Hollow Revelry becomes a 0/0 Zombie enchantment creature with "Hollow Revelry gets +1/+1 for each counter on it."

card.name: Lockstock Vakhter
card.text: Lockstock Vakhter gets +3/+0 as long as you control two or more artifacts. Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast if you control four or more artifacts. Whenever you cast an artifact spell while you control six or more artifacts, draw a card.

card.name: Plea Beneath the Surface
card.text: Choose one. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater as you cast this spell, you may choose two instead. • Destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less. • Return target land card in your graveyard to your hand. • You gain 4 life.

card.name: Reckoner of the Bend
card.text: Reckoner of the Bend gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control. Metalcraft — Reckoner of the Bend has menace and trample as long as you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Resolute Marshal
card.text: When Resolute Marshal enters, search your library for an Equipment card, exile it, then shuffle. Then create a Hunt battle token an opponent protects with 2 defense and "When this battle is defeated, put the exiled card onto the battlefield." You can't attack it this turn.

card.name: Echo of the Oathbound
card.text: Lifelink When Echo of the Oathbound enters, for each creature you control, create a Weapon token and attach it to that creature. (A Weapon is an Equipment artifact with equip {2} and "Equipped creature gets +1/+1.")

card.name: Binding of Winter's Breath
card.text: At the beginning of your second main phase, you gain 1 life. When you do, untap up to X target nonland permanents, where X is the amount of life you've gained this turn.

card.name: Brightstep Chorus
card.text: Double strike, ward {1} Metalcraft — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more artifacts, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Concord of the Veiled
card.text: Presence 3 (As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap three untapped lands, artifacts, and/or creatures you control.) Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Reflected Memories
card.text: Presence 2 (As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap two untapped lands, artifacts, and/or creatures you control.) For each token you control, create a token that's a copy of that permanent.

card.name: Lurker of the Whisperfens
card.text: Flash When Lurker of the Whisperfens enters, you may tap target artifact or creature and put a stun counter on it. Creatures you don't control with counters on them lose all abilities.

card.name: Devourer of Forms
card.text: Whenever Devourer of Forms becomes tapped, you may have it become a copy of target creature you control, except it has this ability.

card.name: Coven of Three
card.text: Flash This spell can't be countered. Flying, ward {3} {1}{U}{U}, Discard Coven of Three: Counter target spell.

card.name: Tidings Carried on Ash
card.text: Create a Hunt battle token an opponent protects with 2 defense and "When this battle is defeated, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying." Draw two cards.

card.name: Trinket Seeker
card.text: When Trinket Seeker enters, create a colorless artifact token named Twiddlebox with "{U}, {T}: Tap or untap another target nonland permanent. Activate only outside of combat." Whenever Trinket Seeker deals combat damage to a player or noncreature permanent, you may draw a card.

card.name: Flourish Together
card.text: Presence 3 (As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap three untapped lands, artifacts, and/or creatures you control.) Until end of turn, whenever you cast a spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copies. You can't cast spells named Flourish Together this turn.

card.name: Kaelthar's Decree
card.text: Presence X (As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap X untapped lands, artifacts, and/or creatures you control.) Search your library for an artifact, instant, or sorcery card with mana value X or less, exile it, then shuffle. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Echo of the Pane
card.text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Whenever a creature an opponent control dies, if its toughness was less than 1, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. {B}: Echo of the Pane gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Arrive in Silence and Ash
card.text: Presence X (As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap X untapped lands, artifacts, and/or creatures you control.) Put X -1/-1 counters on each creature.

card.name: Everwatching Praznostrazh
card.text: Creatures your opponents control enter with an additional -1/-1 counter on them. Each creature your opponents control gets -1/-1 for each counter on it other than a -1/-1 counter.

card.name: Lady on the Blighted Mare
card.text: Whenever another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Pay 4 life: Lady on the Blighted Mare gains indestructible and wither until end of turn. (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

card.name: Become Unwritten
card.text: Presence 2 (As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap two untapped lands, artifacts, and/or creatures you control.) Choose a nonland card name. Search target player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. That player shuffles, then draws a card for each card exiled from hand this way.

card.name: Sorrow Lasher
card.text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Whenever Sorrow Lasher deals damage to a player, that player's maximum hand size becomes four for the rest of the game.

card.name: Cragroot Rumbler
card.text: Haste Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn, create a 3/3 green Elemental creature token.

card.name: Eyes of Struna
card.text: Flying Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, if it had three or more counters on it, return Eyes of Struna from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Rimebag Wretch
card.text: Menace During your turn, you may cast instant and sorcery spells from your graveyard by sacrificing an artifact in addition to their other costs. If a spell cast this way would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.

card.name: Warbark Reaver
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a token that's a copy of target Equipment you control. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. Metalcraft — Equipment you control have equip {0} as long as you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: The Flames Know Guilt
card.text: All damage dealt to creatures your opponents control is dealt as though its source had wither. (Damage is dealt to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) When The Flames Know Guilt enters, it deals 4 damage to any target.

card.name: Strike of Conviction
card.text: Presence 3 (As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap three untapped lands, artifacts, and/or creatures you control.) Strike of Conviction deals 5 damage to any target. If a permanent dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: One Breath from Ruin
card.text: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0. Metalcraft — Whenever you attack, if you control three or more artifacts, you may create a 1/1 red Devil creature token that's tapped and attacking.

card.name: Honeytongued Sibilisk
card.text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Whenever a creature you control with wither deals damage to a player, that player gets that many poison counters.

card.name: Master of the Pale Frost
card.text: Whenever an Equipment you control enters, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token, then you may attach that Equipment to that token. Whenever you attack with two or more equipped creatures, draw a card.

card.name: Stampeding Gorejaw
card.text: When Stampeding Gorejaw enters, create three Hunt battle tokens an opponent protects with 2 defense and "When this battle is defeated, create a 3/3 green Elemental creature token." Whenever a creature you control dies, it deals damage equal to its power to up to one target battle.

card.name: Instinctive Bond
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card and a nonbasic land card and reveal them. Put the basic land onto the battlefield tapped and put the other into your hand.

card.name: Consonance of Seasons
card.text: Mill ten cards. For each different mana value among them, you may put a permanent card with that mana value milled this way onto the battlefield.

card.name: Prepare the Vessel
card.text: Enchant creature or planeswalker When Prepare the Vessel enters, draw a card. Whenever you activate an ability of enchanted permanent, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy. (Mana abilities can't be copied.)

card.name: First Step into Snezvalir
card.text: Equip abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate. Whenever a creature you control with power 4 or greater dies, draw a card.

card.name: Songward Watcher
card.text: Flash Flying When Songward Watcher enters, another target permanent you control gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Tender Patchbinder
card.text: Metalcraft — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more artifacts, target artifact you control becomes a 0/0 Construct creature with "This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control."

card.name: Thrust Beyond the Shard
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Exile target creature or planeswalker and its controller's graveyard.

card.name: Gildfrost Ancient
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever Gildfrost Ancient attacks, exile the top three cards of your library. Create a Treasure token for each land card exiled this way. You may cast a card exiled this way.

card.name: Vakhter Conscriptor
card.text: Whenever Vakhter Conscriptor becomes tapped, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. At the beginning of your end step, if there are three or more cards exiled by Vakhter Conscriptor, create a 1/1 green Human creature token.

card.name: Blade of the Rimecourt
card.text: Vigilance Whenever an artifact or creature an opponent control enters untapped, they may put a stun counter on it. If they don't, tap it. Blade of the Rimecourt gets +3/+0 and can't be blocked as long as there are three or more counters on permanents your opponents controls.

card.name: The Frozen Gaol
card.text: When The Frozen Gaol enters, create four Hunt battle tokens an opponent protects with 2 defense and "When this battle is defeated, mill four cards." When you have 20 or more cards in your graveyard, transform The Frozen Gaol. --- (Back): Virelen of Severed Malice

card.name: Virelen of Severed Malice
card.text: Ward—Pay 7 life. Trample, lifelink Whenever you gain life, return up to one target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it, where X is the amount of life you gained. --- (Front): The Frozen Gaol

card.name: Veyhalde Emberhold
card.text: When Veyhalde Emberhold enters, create a Hunt battle token an opponent protects with 2 defense and "When this battle is defeated, draw a card." Whenever you defeat a battle, Veyhalde Emberhold deals 3 damage to the player protecting it.

card.name: Brute of Kroslav Heights
card.text: Trample Whenever a creature you control becomes tapped, you may put a stun counter on it. If you do, double its power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Jednooko Creeper
card.text: Trample Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Jednooko Creeper, put it onto the battlefield instead of putting it into your graveyard.

card.name: Dravhollow Current Weaver
card.text: Flash Dravhollow Current Weaver can't have counters put on it. Whenever Dravhollow Current Weaver becomes tapped, draw a card.

card.name: Promise of Peril
card.text: Exile the top five cards of target opponent's library and separate them into two piles. That opponent chooses a pile and puts it into their graveyard. You may play cards in the other pile for as long as they remain exiled and mana of any type can be spent to cast them.

card.name: Krovin, the Gilded Maw
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may have the following occur based on the number of card types among permanents you've sacrificed this turn. [b]1+ [/b]| You draw a card and you lose 1 life. [b]2+ [/b]| Each opponent discards a card. [b]3+ [/b]| Krovin deals 3 damage to each opponent.[b] 4+ [/b]| Return up to three permanent cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Tithe of Flesh
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you've sacrificed one or more permanents this turn, you may search your library for a permanent card with mana value equal to or less than the number of permanents you've sacrificed this turn, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Crystalfang Howler
card.text: Trample Whenever Crystalfang Howler enters or attacks, choose two. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Destroy target artifact or enchantment. • Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. • You gain 3 life.

card.name: Crone's Choosing
card.text: Destroy all nonland permanents with mana value 1 or less. {2}{W}{B}, Discard Crone's Choosing: Destroy target nonland permanent. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Shardbreath Tyrant
card.text: Flying, haste Artifacts you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell."

card.name: Siphoned Radiance
card.text: Distribute X -1/-1 counters among any number of target creatures, where X is the total power of creatures you control as you cast this spell.

card.name: Forlorn Hope
card.text: Destroy all creatures and tokens.

card.name: Begin the Empty Pursuit
card.text: Whenever you attack, target creature can't be blocked this turn. Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player or noncreature permanent, draw a card. (If multiple battles are damaged, you draw multiple cards.)

card.name: Steps Towards Destiny
card.text: Search your library for a card with mana value 1, reveal it, and put it into your hand, then shuffle. You may cast a spell with mana value 1 from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Glimpse Beyond the Rime
card.text: Presence X (As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap X untapped lands, artifacts, and/or creatures you control.) You gain X life and draw X cards. Then, discard a number of cards equal to the number of artifacts and/or creatures tapped to cast this spell.

card.name: Selyndor Mindshaper
card.text: Flash Flying Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Creatures your opponents control with counters on them can't attack you or planeswalkers you control and can't block.

card.name: Reap the Kindling
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a kindling counter on Reap the Kindling. Then you may have it become a X/X Incarnation creature with menace until end of turn, where X is the number of kindling counters on it.

card.name: Boilmaw Lomie
card.text: You may play an additional land on each of your turns. {R}: Boilmaw Lomie gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {G}: Boilmaw Lomie gains your choice of vigilance, reach, trample, or haste until end of turn.

card.name: Hope Beneath the Boughs
card.text: Whenever you attack, search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to or less than the number of attacking equipped creatures you control, put it onto the battlefield tapped and attacking, then shuffle.

card.name: Sunveil Seraph
card.text: Flying If you would gain life, you may gain life equal to Sunveil Seraph's power instead. If an opponent would lose life, you may have that player lose life equal to Sunveil Seraph's power instead. (Combat damage is one instance of losing life.)

card.name: Crowned in Summer
card.text: Each player may discard their hand and draw five cards. Each player who didn't creates three Treasure tokens.

card.name: Erlhan of the Empty Pursuit
card.text: Trample Other creatures you control have trample. Whenever a nontoken creature you control with power 4 or greater dies, exile that creature. If you do, create a Hunt battle token an opponent protects with 2 defense and "When this battle is defeated, create a token that's a copy of the exiled creature card."

card.name: Hero of Earned Steel
card.text: When Hero of Earned Steel enters, create a Weapon token and attach it to Hero of Earned Steel. (It's an Equipment artifact with equip {2} and "Equipped creature gets +1/+1.") Whenever an equipped creature you control dies, you may attach an Equipment that was attached to that creature to target creature you control.

card.name: Kaelthar, He Who Stills
card.text: Flash Vigilance Kaelthar can't have counters put on him. Whenever Kaelthar enters or attacks, tap target nonland permanent and put a stun counter on it. It loses all abilities until it untaps.

card.name: Sisters of Rain and River
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a Hunt battle token an opponent protects with 2 defense and "When this battle is defeated, draw a card." At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a token that's a copy of another target creature you control, except it's a 1/1 with haste. At the beginning of your end step, each opponent sacrifices a creature if a creature died under your control this turn.

card.name: Vesnara, She Who Bloomed
card.text: Flying Whenever Vesnara attacks, mill three cards. When you do, return target Equipment card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. It's a 2/2 Scarecrow artifact creature. Change its text by replacing all instances of "Equipped creature" with "This creature."

card.name: Draveth of One Cut
card.text: Flying When Draveth of One Cut enters, create a Hunt battle token an opponent protects with 2 defense and "When this battle is defeated, draw a card." Whenever you defeat a battle, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

card.name: Sorvain, He Who Collects
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, exile target creature card from your graveyard. Create a Hunt battle token an opponent protects with 2 defense and "When this battle is defeated, put the exiled card onto the battlefield."

card.text: --- (Back): The Overflowing Vessel

card.name: The Overflowing Vessel
card.text: --- (Front): Ciar, Lost Vessel

card.name: Solmhar, He Who Reaps
card.text: Flying Whenever you sacrifice a nontoken permanent, create a token that's a copy of that permanent. It has haste and "At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this permanent."

card.name: Silence, Kaelthar's Oath
Tiller of Realms
Dewfrost Treads
card.text: Flash When Dewfrost Treads enters, attach it to target creature you control. That creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and can't have counters put on it. Equip {1}

card.name: Virelen's Skull
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has deathtouch. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, choose one that hasn't been chosen. If you can't, that player loses the game. • That player discards a card. • That player sacrifices a creature. • You gain 3 life. Equip {2}

card.name: Soulbound Doll
card.text: Flash Creatures entering don't cause abilities to trigger.

card.name: Garland of Trez
Stitched Witness
card.text: As Stitched Witness enters the battlefield, create X Weapon tokens. Stitched Witness enters the battlefield with those tokens attached to it. When Stitched Witness dies, you may equip any number of Equipment attached to it to any other creatures you control.

card.name: Fateful Beacon
Oathbound Reliquary
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and menace. At the beginning of your end step, draw three cards if an opponent lost life this turn. Otherwise, an opponent gains control of Oathbound Reliquary. Equip—Discard a card.

card.name: The Thirsting Pane
Frostveil Crossroads
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, Sacrifice Frostveil Crossroads: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Unyielding Witness
card.text: Reach Unyielding Witness can't have counters put on it.

card.name: Vigil of Those Lost
card.text: When Vigil of Those Lost enters, create a Weapon token. (It's an Equipment artifact with equip {2} and "Equipped creature gets +1/+1.") {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Quietward Stones
card.text: When Quietward Stones enters or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Woundlace Doll
Betrayer's Effigy
card.text: Flash When Betrayer's Effigy enters, it deals 5 damage to target creature an opponent controls. Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has trample. Equip {2}

card.name: Copper-Blooded Warden
card.text: When Copper-Blooded Warden enters, create a Weapon token. (It's an Equipment artifact with equip {2} and "Equipped creature gets +1/+1.")

card.name: Cold Rebuttal
card.text: Presence 1 (As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap an untapped land, artifact, or creature you control.) Exile target spell. (It won't resolve.)

card.name: Greedwrought Scourge
card.text: Flying {2}{B}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Scry 1 if a nontoken permanent was sacrificed this way. Draw a card.

card.name: Threadsnare Hag
card.text: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) During your turn, Threadsnare Hag has first strike.

card.name: Mercy's Burden
card.text: Target creature you control gains hexproof until end of turn. Create a Weapon token, then attach it to that creature. (It's an Equipment artifact with equip {2} and "Equipped creature gets +1/+1.")

card.name: Concord of Ashes
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. Metalcraft — Up to two target creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn if you control three or more artifacts.

card.text: Flying

card.name: Lifebinder's Bough
Cast to Slumber
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If that creature had counters on it, instead you may have its owner put it on the top or bottom of their library.

card.name: Veilbound Nocnitsa
card.text: Flying When Veilbound Nocnitsa enters, exile target non-Demon creature card from your graveyard. Create a Hunt battle token an opponent protects with 2 defense and "When this battle is defeated, put the exiled card onto the battlefield." You can't attack it this turn.

card.name: Cornered Tusker
card.text: Haste {T}, Sacrifice Cornered Tusker: It deals damage equal to its power to any target.

card.name: Tidy Blessing
card.text: Destroy target artifact, battle, or enchantment.

card.name: Construct TRO

card.text: Noncreature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.text: Flying

card.name: Hunt for a Card TRO
card.text: (This token enters under an opponent's protection. You and others can attack it.) When this battle is defeated, draw a card.

card.name: Hunt for a Dragon TRO
card.text: (This token enters under an opponent's protection. You and others can attack it.) When this battle is defeated, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

card.name: Hunt for Returns TRO
card.text: (This token enters under an opponent's protection. You and others can attack it.) When this battle is defeated, return the exiled card/s to the battlefield.

card.name: Hunt for Whisperfoot Skitterers TRO
card.text: (This token enters under an opponent's protection. You and others can attack it.) When this battle is defeated, you may search your library for a card named Whisperfoot Skitterer, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Hunt for Echoes TRO
card.text: (This token enters under an opponent's protection. You and others can attack it.) When this battle is defeated, create a token that's a copy of the exiled card.

card.name: Stillness Reclaimed
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to one nonland permanent card with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Veyhalde Liaison
card.text: Veyhalde Liaison can't be countered. At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, create a Hunt battle token an opponent protects with 2 defense and "When this battle is defeated, create a 3/3 green Elemental creature token."

card.name: Slasher of Stragglers
card.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice an artifact: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. {2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Steel Never Sleeps
card.text: This spell costs {1}{R} less to cast if it targets only a single creature. Untap any number of target equipped and/or artifact creatures you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

card.name: Rebirth the Self
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy all artifacts. • Destroy all enchantments. • Create two 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens.

card.name: Virelen's Call
card.text: Presence X (As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap X untapped lands, artifacts, and/or creatures you control.) Return any number of creature cards with total mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Dance of the Ovinnik
card.text: Create three 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink.

card.name: Mourning Current
card.text: Mourning Current can't be blocked. Whenever Mourning Current deals combat damage to a player or noncreature permanent, scry 1.

card.name: Pactstitcher
card.text: When Pactstitcher enters or dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {2}{B}, Sacrifice Pactstitcher: Remove all counters from target nonland permanent.

card.name: Frantic Bukavac
card.text: When Frantic Bukavac enters, choose one — • Frantic Bukavac deals 3 damage to any nonplayer target. • Destroy target nonbasic land.

card.name: Evercareful Dvorovoi
card.text: Flash This spell can't be countered. When Evercareful Dvorovoi enters, counter all activated and triggered abilities from nonland sources.

card.name: Sanctum of the Stilled Bloom
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Target player exiles a card from their graveyard. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Sanctum of the Stilled Bloom: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of cards exiled by Sanctum of the Stilled Bloom. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Steal the Name
card.text: As Steal the Name enters, each opponent reveals half the cards in their hand, rounded down. Then you choose a nonland card name. Spells with the chosen name can't be cast.

card.name: Elena of the Quiet Vale
card.text: Flash Lifelink Metalcraft — When Elena enters, if you cast her from your hand, return target noncreature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand. Then you may cast a copy of that card without paying its mana cost if you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Mirepath Crossing
card.text: Mirepath Crossing enters tapped unless you control no other lands. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. --- (Back): Mirepath Supplicant

card.name: Mirepath Supplicant
card.text: Lifelink Whenever Mirepath Supplicant dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. --- (Front): Mirepath Crossing

card.name: Field of Ruin
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Field of Ruin: Destroy target nonbasic land an opponent controls. Each player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield, then shuffles.

card.name: Twiddlebox TRO
card.text: {U}, {T}: Tap or untap another target permanent. Activate only outside of combat.

card.name: Hunt for Release TRO
card.text: (This token enters under an opponent's protection. You and others can attack it.) When this battle is defeated, you mill four cards.

card.name: Hunt for Glory TRO
card.text: (This token enters under an opponent's protection. You and others can attack it.) When this battle is defeated, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Hunt for Friends TRO
card.text: (This token enters under an opponent's protection. You and others can attack it.) When this battle is defeated, create a 0/0 colorless Construct artifact creature token with "This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control."

card.name: Hunt for Elemental TRO
card.text: (This token enters under an opponent's protection. You and others can attack it.) When this battle is defeated, create a 3/3 green Elemental creature token.

card.name: Standard of the Risen Blade
Confessor's Thorn
Bitterguard Blade
Bundle of Borrowed Charms
Wreath of the Willing Bloom
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. When you do, destroy target artifact or enchantment that player controls." Equip {1}

card.name: Reforged Vakhter
card.text: Double strike When Reforged Vakhter enters, each opponent exiles a card from their hand and may play that card for as long as it remains exiled. Each spell cast this way costs {1} more to cast. Each land played this way enters tapped.

card.name: Fractal Archivist
card.text: Flash When Fractal Archivist enters, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If that permanent had mana value 2 or less, instead you may have its owner put it on the top or bottom of their library.

card.name: Ivrek Scrivener
card.text: Ivrek Scrivener can't have counters put on it. At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice another nonland permanent. If you do, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Edgeborne Stalwart
card.text: Edgeborne Stalwart can't have counters put on it. Whenever Edgeborne Stalwart dies, it deals damage to any target equal to its power.

card.name: Crystalfang Keeper
card.text: Whenever Crystalfang Keeper enters or attacks, you may exile target card from a graveyard. {1}, Put a card exiled by Crystalfang Keeper on the bottom of its owner's library: Until end of turn, Crystalfang Keeper gets +1/+2 if that card was a creature card and hexproof if it was an instant or sorcery card.

card.name: Syr Varek of Bratovik
card.text: Flash Lifelink When Syr Varek of Bratovik enters, for each player, exile up to one target non-Noble creature that player controls or a creature card in that player's graveyard. When Syr Varek of Bratovik is no longer on the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owner's hand.

card.name: Larynya, the Moon's Remnant
Odranna, the Shadelit
card.text: Protection from permanents with counters on them. Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Whenever Odranna, the Shadelit deals combat damage to a player, you draw a card and you lose 2 life.

card.name: Syr Kreshtan of the Ember Wake
card.text: Syr Kreshtan gets +1/+2 and has flying as long as you control a Dragon. When Syr Kreshtan of the Ember Wake enters, create a Hunt battle token an opponent protects with 2 defense and "When this battle is defeated, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying."

card.name: Syr Thomir of the Golden Stag
card.text: Vigilance, reach, ward {2} Whenever another creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.

card.name: Herbalist of Kroslav Bend
card.text: When Herbalist of Kroslav Bend enters, create a Hunt battle token an opponent protects with 2 defense and "When this battle is defeated, create a 3/3 green Elemental creature token."

card.name: Burden of the Crown
card.text: Presence 4 (As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap four untapped lands, artifacts, and/or creatures you control.) Draw three cards.

card.name: Gift of Hollow Life
card.text: Exile target creature card from your graveyard. Create a Hunt battle token an opponent protects with 2 defense and "When this battle is defeated, put the exiled card onto the battlefield."

card.name: Farewell in Steel
card.text: Create a Hunt battle token an opponent protects with 2 defense and "When this battle is defeated, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying."

card.name: Fall of the Golden Stag
card.text: You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power. Otherwise, you gain life equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.
